experience.title: Talent
experience.description: Winner of UNLEASH Hacks India. Participated in the hackathon designed to address the UN's Sustainable Development Goals (SDG 11 & 13 - Sustainable Communities & Cities, and Climate Action). The focus of the Hack was to help the vulnerable communities living in the cyclone-prone eastern coast of India.
experience.description_html: Winner of UNLEASH Hacks India. experience.title: Summer Research Intern
experience.description: • Applied event study approach to understand the effect of CEO change on various stocks listed under the national stock exchange (NSE)• Graded various sources of information covering the event on the metrics of polarity & subjectivity to generate a sentiment score• Computed the correlation between stock fluctuations & sentiment associated with the announcements to check the information hypothesis
